name: Flat Idea
description:
DID YOU SAY... FLAT?

Can you image what would happen to a flat earth if its population gets overgrown?Put your aluminum hat and prepare yourself to destroy everything to avoid the earth from collapsing! 

How to Play

A/D - Move the camera

Mouse - Aim

Scrool - Zoom In/Out

LMB - Shoot!

OBS: Some web browsers jeopardizes the game performace (we don't know why), if it is your case, please try the game on other browser and activate the low quality settings in options menu.
